tgt_original: abhranīhāradhūmena rāhuvaktrarajādibhiḥ ||  (18) evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittam āvṛtaṃ pañcabhir malaiḥ |
(19) (4) agniśaucaṃ yathā vastraṃ malinaṃ vividhair malaiḥ |
agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ na vastratā ||
(20) evaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ malinaṃ rāgajair malaiḥ |  jñānāgninā malaṃ dagdhaṃ na dagdhaṃ tat prabhāsvaram ||
